name: Chia-Chu Chiang
content: Chia-Chu Chiang, Ph.D. - Professor - Computer Science - UA Little Rock Skip to the content Dr. Chiang is a professor in the Department of Computer Science. Before joining UA Little Rock, he worked at Viasoft in Phoenix, Arizona. In Phoenix, he obtained his Ph.D. in Computer Science from Arizona State University. Dr. Chiang has published more than 100 referred research papers in IEEE, in ACM, and in international journals and conferences. Areas of Expertise Reverse Engineering Reengineering Assembly and PL/I legacy Systems Heterogeneous Distributed Parallel Programming Compilers Programming Languages Software Reverse Engineering Cryptography Formal Methods Contact Information Office: EIT 570 Phone: 501-916-5288 E-mail: [email protected]
